detail_desc: Mittens in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a print motif on the top and scalloped cuffs (Size 0-6 months with no thumb).
Straight-cut cotton jersey T-shirt with a slightly wider neckline.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.

Straight-cut blouse in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a small frilled collar and opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jacquard-knit slipover in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Hairband in patterned jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared shirt in cotton poplin with a large collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Long sleeves, wide, flared cuffs with a slit and ties, and high slits in the sides of the hem.
Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and longer legs with laser-cut hems. Light shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Shoulder bag in suede with a quilted front, zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x15x20 cm.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a roll-edge neckline and long, wide sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Lace blouse with a stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Wide flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and a flared peplum. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Jacket in a recycled polyester weave with notch lapels, concealed press-stud fasteners, gently dropped, padded shoulders and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Wide smocking to define the waist, and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with appliqués and sewn-on ears. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a linen blend with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a boat neck, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an all-over print, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and narrow hems.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Cropped jacket in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and tabs with buttons at the hem.

Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to long shorts. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and legs that can be folded up and fastened with a tab and button.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide shorts in cotton twill. High waist with pleats, wide belt loops and a detachable tie belt with a metal buckle. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a lower crotch, a large open canvas front pocket and flap back pockets. Legs with folded side panels and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ties under the chin and earflaps. Jersey lining.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.
Short top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust with a double flounce below.
Nightdress in patterned cotton jersey with a frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and a gathered seam at the top.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Espadrilles in imitation leather with a braided jute trim around the soles and crossover foot straps with a decorative metal ring at the top. Imitation leather insoles. Platform at the back 5.5 cm.
Trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.
Teddy jacket in soft faux shearling with a zip down the front, concealed pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Joggers in soft cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Jersey lining.

Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal chain necklaces in various lengths and designs. One snake chain necklace and two with pendants. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm, 48-55 cm and 62.5-70 cm.

Flared dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and a skirt in broderie anglaise, buttons down the back and a seam at the waist. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frills down the front that continue down the back, long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.
Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with a print motif on the front, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut playsuit in a cotton crêpe weave with a V-neck and partially concealed buttons at the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, flap chest pockets and patch front pockets. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a button fly and short, wide legs with turn-ups at the hems.
Low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Short parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, concealed press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a round neck and gathered side seams for optimum comfort over the tummy.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Rib-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Polo-neck jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shorter, wide-fitting top in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Wide, tie-top shoulder straps, a wide flounce at the top and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled weave with a frill-trimmed lace yoke and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Frill-trimmed seams and covered buttons at the front and wide smocking at the back of the hem.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, a seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.

Block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric with a high collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Imitation leather leggings with an elasticated waist and seams at the knees.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, V-neck top with smocking and ties at the back and narrow adjustable shoulder straps Lined at the front.
Thong briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft twill with front pockets and a high waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Raglan sleeves, welt front pockets and jersey trims around the hood, cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a motif and appliqué on the front. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and raw-edge hems.
